title: Ticket #7244: Fix issues with UDP packet starvation from last release
description:
This ticket will address the issues identified in the code review in ticket #7149.

The follow changes will be made:

  • Add a limit on the number of UDP message fragments that will be processed in CallSocketHandler(), based on MAX_UDP_MSGS_PER_CYCLE.
  • Remove the call to SafeSock::handle_incoming_packet() in DaemonCore::Driver(), replaced by a call in CallSocketHandler() before any call to HandleReq().
  • Move the Selector object in CallSocketHandler() out of the while loop.
